title: Couldn't pick a champion in ranked lobby, lost my promos because of it.
body:
I would really appreciate if I could get the lp back or if Riot could give my promos back, as I clearly had no control over me losing this game.

Hopefully this bug gets fixed soon. I've been getting myself hyped for this game all day, only for the client to glitch out :(

P.S. I don't know if this violates any rules regarding not naming and shaming, seeing as my teammates names were shown. If it is, sorry!

replies.body:
This is a pretty massive bug, and really annoying. It is one of the ones I have experienced myself (luckily only twice so far). 

**Be sure to [submit a client bug report](https://pbr.leagueoflegends.com/oce/en_AU/bugReport/create?app_name=LeagueClient&app_version=4224096-4233814&system_os=windows&user_agent=Mozilla%2F5.0%20(Windows%20NT%206.2%3B%20WOW64)%20AppleWebKit%2F537.36%20(KHTML%2C%20like%20Gecko)%20Chrome%2F49.0.2623.110%20Safari%2F537.36), as the more info they have going through the official targeted channels the better.**
Submitted. Good to know it's not just happening to me.
shit like this has happened to me on numerous occasions
rofl! bad luck, doubt you're going to get any help. Just suck it up and move on.
Well 7 fighters were out of commission that game

Wow thats stink!

You definitely deserve to have your promos back.
_(I doubt you will though, ive never seen or heard of anyone being put back in their promos.)_

They should at very very least have to re-fund your LP!
You possibly didn't have any available fighters to pick, when the video started you already had the fighter tab selected, and because you had none, there was nothing to choose.

I don't think this is the case.

I most certainly own many fighter champions, and I flicked between other class tabs, so that can't have been the case.

Also I couldn't change my summoner spells and my client froze at the end of the lobby instead of returning me to the home page, so I definitely think it's a bug.
